meanings.definition: The quality or state of being different.
meanings.sent1: Her differentness from the others made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The differentness of their opinions led to a lively debate.
meanings.sent3: His differentness in fashion choices always brought a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent4: The differentness of her perspective opened up new possibilities for the team.
meanings.sent5: The differentness of the new student's accent fascinated everyone in the class.

meanings.definition: The condition of being distinct or unique.
meanings.sent1: The differentness of her artwork set her apart from other artists.
meanings.sent2: Each snowflake has its own differentness, making them beautiful in their uniqueness.
meanings.sent3: The differentness of his collection of antique coins was a source of envy among collectors.
meanings.sent4: The differentness of her approach to problem-solving was both refreshing and effective.
meanings.sent5: The differentness of the rare flower species captured the botanist's attention.
